links.title: 11 Tesla FUD Claims Of Years Past - Jumping Into A Time Machine
links.description: On a Tesla Motors Club thread, some members there recently shared a few old claims of perennial Tesla bears. It was a brilliant little move of reverse trolling, and it prompted me to do something I've been wanting to do for ages - dig up some old claims about Tesla from prominent bears and see how they held up to the light of today.

messages.body:
$TSLA   
Tesla's revenue growth looks better than it should thanks to a disclosure  shortcut  https://www.marketwatch.com/story/teslas-revenue-growth-looks-better-than-it-should-thanks-to-a-disclosure-shortcut-2018-08-04

links.title: Tesla's revenue growth looks better than it should thanks to a disclosure shortcut
links.description: By Tesla Inc.'s shortcut to new revenue-recognition rules artificially boosted revenue growth in quarterly results reported this week, a growing issue as the new rules governing companies' recognition of revenue continue to be adopted. Tesla this year adopted a new revenue-recognition rule, ASC 606, which changed the way it accounts for automobile sales with a resale value guarantee and cars leased through its leasing partners.
